song.title: Die With Your Boots On
song.info:
Malekith presents :
DIE WITH YOUR BOOTS ON
Written by IRON MAIDEN (Harris, Dickinson, Smith) Arranged and tracked by Malekith for the BEST OF THE FANS III music disk
One of my favorite Maiden tracks, and my third cover from the album Piece Of Mind which is, in my opinion, one of the best heavy metal albums i have ever heard.
And now, the credits :
- Rhythm guitar samples by Betrayer - Lead guitar samples by Cadaver - Bass and drums by... i really don't know, these samples were all ripped here and there, without any name to credit
Greets to Hakan and Dragon, Betrayer, Cadaver, Crow, Amok, Corpse and everyone who supports heavy metal in all its forms - and, last but not least, to the new Maiden. Bruce and Adrian back... the band will rule again. UP THE IRONS !
playing time : 5'35 max channels : 14 tracking time : about 5 hours of basic tracking (3 for the solos), plus a few more of fine tuning, arranging the solos, finding one or two samples missing, setting pannings, and trying to make this mod better and better just for your little ears... so, if you don't like it... :))))))
btw. the vocal channels are #15 and 16, if you don't like the vocal sample...
email me at : malekith@listen.to my website : http://listen.to/malekith ICQ : 49731906
and don't forget to check the whole disk... it might rule !!!!! see you...
Malekith
